input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Dell Inspiron 1750 17.3-Inch Obsidian Black Laptop - Up to 4 Hours 42 Minutes of Battery Life, MS Home and Student Software Included (Windows 7 Home Premium) [Discontinued By Manufacturer]

Item specifications:
2.1GHz Intel Pentium Dual Core T4300 Processor
4GB Memory
320GB Hard Drive, DVDR/RW Optical Drive
17.3" Display, Integrated Intel 4500 MHD Media Accelerator Graphics
Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium (64-bit), *Up to 4 Hours 42 Minutes of Battery Life
input_text.Response A: This laptop is a great choice for anyone looking for a powerful, yet portable computer with long battery life. The Intel Pentium Dual Core processor provides plenty of speed for everyday tasks such as web browsing, email, and word processing, while the large 17.3" display is great for watching movies or working on documents. The included MS Home and Student software provides a complete office suite for creating documents, spreadsheets, and presentations, and the 64-bit version of Windows 7 offers a more secure and stable operating environment. With up to 4 hours 42 minutes of battery life, you can stay productive all day long without worrying about finding a power outlet.
input_text.Response B: This Dell Inspiron 1750 17.3-Inch Obsidian Black Laptop is a great choice for those who are looking for a powerful yet affordable laptop. The 2.1GHz Intel Pentium Dual Core T4300 Processor and 4GB Memory make this laptop a great choice for those who are looking for a laptop that can handle a lot of work. The 320GB Hard Drive and DVDR/RW Optical Drive give you plenty of storage space and the 17.3" Display, Integrated Intel 4500 MHD Media Accelerator Graphics and MS Home and Student Software Included (Windows 7 Home Premium) make this laptop a great choice for those who are looking for a laptop that has a lot of features.
